resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
#1 This app is a clone of the World\'s most famous social app Instagram, developed and maintaned by Facebook Inc.
#2 This app does not use Instagram\'s real servers and content, it has own server and data mostly used for demo purposes
#3 Any data stored in this app is not related in any way to Instagram or Facebook Inc.
#4 This app is never going to be live on Google Play because it\'s main purpose is not to copy the real Instagram.
I wanted to create a clone of the world\'s most famous social application Instagram, to improve and strengthen my skills as Android developer.
Please leave your comments on my email d.miloshevski@gmail.com
